amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike language that requires the entire additional amount for Farm Service Agency salaries and expenses to be designated by Congress as an emergency requirement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike language that requires the entire additional amount for Farm Service Agency salaries and expenses to be designated by the Congress as an emergency requirement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stenholm amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 345, 2 Present (Roll no. 67).
